title: Key Lime Sorbet
meta: Kitchen Aid Mixer attachment takes 30 mins on 'stir' setting.

directions.text: Combine sugar, preserves and 1 cup of the soda in a pan.
Stir over low heat until all is dissolved.
Zest the lemon and lime, and add zest and juice to pan.
Stir in rest of soda, and refrigerate for 3 hours.
Mix mixture in an ice cream maker, and freeze for at least 1 hour.
